data.title: 175 4th St W, Hungry Horse, MT 59919
data.meta_description: Zillow has 50 photos of this $774,000 3 beds, 2 baths, 1,531 Square Feet single family home located at 175 4th St W, Hungry Horse, MT 59919 built in 1997. MLS #30030437.
data.text: Charming Income-Producing Short-Term Rental 10 minutes from Glacier National Park. Welcome to your new getaway or investment property in the picturesque town of Hungry Horse, Montana. This unique property boasts a three-bedroom, two-bath main home, and a one-bedroom studio apartment in the detached garage, offering versatile rental options. Whether you choose to live in one unit and rent the other or rent both units together throughout the summer season, this property is a proven income producer. Nestled on a dead-end street in a quiet neighborhood, you'll enjoy a quaint setting with mature landscaping. Relax in the hot tub or entertain guests with the outdoor furniture provided. The property comes fully furnished with only a few exclusions, making it move-in or rental-ready from day one. Location is everything, and this gem is perfectly situated for outdoor enthusiasts: *Flathead River :Just minutes away for fishing, kayaking, and stunning river views. A short drive to explore hiking trails, wildlife, and breathtaking landscapes in the gorgeous GNP. - *Hungry Horse Reservoir: Minutes away, Ideal for boating, fishing, and camping. - *Whitefish, Montana: Only 25 minutes away, offering shopping, dining, and skiing in the winter. - *Flathead Lake : A 30-minute drive to enjoy swimming, sailing, and picnicking. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity. See documents for showing availability. Booked often throughout summer. Call Tammy Purdy at 406-212-0081 or your real estate professional today!
